content: this is a relatively simple pattern crochet long-wise so make sure you don t make your chains too tight the yarn is lovely to work with and so soft and yummy as a scarf can be made longer or shorter to suit your preference by adding or subtracting chains in pairs blog entry includes a little commentary on the yarn feel free to leave your own comments on there as well i have done this also with lion brand s nature s choice organic cotton and it works well with that but makes a bulkier scarf
